snippet: Senate Democrats on Wednesday postponed a committee vote on the nomination of Thomas E. Perez to lead the Labor Department after the chamber’s top Republican raised doubts about Mr. Perez’s ethics.
abstract: Senate Democrats on Wednesday postponed a committee vote on the nomination of Thomas E. Perez to lead the Labor Department after the chamber’s top Republican raised doubts about Mr. Perez’s ethics.

headline.main: Senate Panel Postpones Vote on Obama's Labor Nominee
